newsitem.title: NICARAGUA: Nicaragua's Aleman says Finance head tried to quit.
newsitem.headline: Nicaragua's Aleman says Finance head tried to quit.

text.p: Nicaraguan President Arnoldo Aleman confirmed rumors on Friday that Finance Minister Francisco Lainez had presented a letter of resignation, but Aleman said he persuaded the cabinet member to stay.
"Twenty days ago he gave me a letter but I told him to reconsider," Aleman said.
Local analysts said Lainez wanted to desert the post because of disagreements with "the youngest" members of Aleman's cabinet.
Lainez founded Nicaragua's central bank and was known in the 1960s as Nicaragua's "Economy Czar."
